param.name: minStorage
param.default: if global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings? and global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Distribution? and global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Distribution.$DefaultMinStorage? then global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Distribution.$DefaultMinStorage else 20

param.name: staticStorage
param.default: if global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings? and global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Distribution? and global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Distribution.$DefaultStaticStorage? then global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Distribution.$DefaultStaticStorage else 40

param.name: maxStorage
param.default: if global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings? and global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Distribution? and global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Distribution.$DefaultMaxStorage? then global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Distribution.$DefaultMaxStorage else 70

param.name: maxDistance
param.default: [if @this.ship.pilot.skill.management le 2 then 1 else if @this.ship.pilot.skill.management le 5 then 3 else if @this.ship.pilot.skill.management le 8 then 5 else if @this.ship.pilot.skill.management le 11 then 10 else if @this.ship.pilot.skill.management le 13 then 15 else 25, 1].max

input_param.name: max
input_param.value: [if @this.ship.pilot.skill.management le 2 then 1 else if @this.ship.pilot.skill.management le 5 then 3 else if @this.ship.pilot.skill.management le 8 then 5 else if @this.ship.pilot.skill.management le 11 then 10 else if @this.ship.pilot.skill.management le 13 then 15 else 25, 1].max

param.name: notifications
param.default: if global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings? and global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Notifications? and global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Notifications.$Verbosity? then global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Notifications.$Verbosity else 1

param.name: debuglevel
param.default: if global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings? and global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Debug? and global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Debug.$DebugLevel? then global.$GT_MK2_GlobalSettings.$Debug.$DebugLevel else 1

do_if.value: this.ship.pilot? and global.$GT_Pilots? and global.$GT_Pilots.{this.ship.pilot}? and global.$GT_Pilots.{this.ship.pilot}.$Level?

debug_text.text: '[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': Training station received - DockAndTrain created for ' + $trainingStation.knownname + ' (level ' + $requiredLevel + ')'
'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': Training station signal ignored - DockAndTrain already active'

do_if.value: this.$homeStation? and this.$homeStation.exists and this.$homeStation.isplayerowned and (not this.ship.commander.exists or this.ship.commander == this.ship or this.ship.commander.isclass.station) and this.ship.commander != this.$homeStation

do_elseif.value: (not this.$homeStation? or not this.$homeStation.exists or not this.$homeStation.isplayerowned) and this.ship.commander.exists and this.ship.commander.isclass.station

debug_text.text: '[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': Re-requested training dispatch for blocked pilot (level ' + $blockedLevel + ')'

set_value.name: this.$autowares
set_value.exact: if this.ship.defaultorder.$autowares? then this.ship.defaultorder.$autowares else true

set_value.name: this.$allowlowvolume
set_value.exact: if this.ship.defaultorder.$allowlowvolume? then this.ship.defaultorder.$allowlowvolume else false

do_elseif.value: this.ship.commander.exists and this.ship.commander != this.ship and this.ship.defaultorder? and this.ship.defaultorder.id == 'Assist' and this.ship.commander.defaultorder?

debug_text.text: '[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': no active sources (sourceList count=' + this.$sourceList.count + ', homeStation=' + (if this.$homeStation? then this.$homeStation.knownname else '(none)') + ')'

do_if.value: this.$homeStation? and this.$homeStation.exists and this.$homeStation.isplayerowned and (not this.ship.commander.exists or this.ship.commander == this.ship or this.ship.commander.isclass.station) and this.ship.commander != this.$homeStation

do_elseif.value: (not this.$homeStation? or not this.$homeStation.exists or not this.$homeStation.isplayerowned) and this.ship.commander.exists and this.ship.commander.isclass.station

do_if.value: this.$debuglevel ge 1 and (not this.$initLogged? or not this.$initLogged)

debug_text.text: '[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': INIT setup | home=' + $homeName + ' | sourceCursor=' + this.$sourceStation.knownname + ' [' + this.$sourceStation.idcode + ']' + ' | src=' + this.$activeSources.count + ' [' + $sourceNames + ']' + ' | dst=' + $activeDestinations.count + ' [' + $destNames + ']' + ' | min/static/max=' + this.$minStorage + '/' + this.$staticStorage + '/' + this.$maxStorage + ' | maxDist=' + this.$maxDistance + ' | minFill=' + this.$minCargoFillPercent + '% | bidir=' + this.$bidirectional + ' | ignoreRules=' + this.$ignoretraderules + ' | allowIllegal=' + this.$allowillegal + ' | wareMode=' + $sourceListMode + ' | notifications=' + this.$notifications + ' | fleet=' + this.$fleetcoordination + ' | destInvalid=' + $destInvalidCount + ' | diagRev=mk2-offerdiag-r3'

'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': STATION src ' + $diagStation.knownname + ' [' + $diagStation.idcode + '] owner=' + (if $diagStation.isplayerowned then 'player' else 'foreign') + ' products=' + $diagProducts.count + ' tradewares=' + $diagTradewares.count + ' resources=' + $diagResources.count + ' waresForOffers=' + $diagSourceWares.count

'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': STATION src ' + $diagStation.idcode + ' ware=' + $diagWare + ' cargo=' + $cargoCount + '/' + $cargoTarget + ' (' + $cargoRatio + '%)' + ' sell(partner:a=' + $sellPartnerAvail + ',m=' + $sellPartnerAmount + '; ignore:a=' + $sellIgnoreAvail + ',m=' + $sellIgnoreAmount + ')' + ' buy(partner:a=' + $buyPartnerAvail + ',m=' + $buyPartnerAmount + '; ignore:a=' + $buyIgnoreAvail + ',m=' + $buyIgnoreAmount + ')'

'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': STATION dst ' + $diagStation.knownname + ' [' + $diagStation.idcode + '] owner=' + (if $diagStation.isplayerowned then 'player' else 'foreign') + ' products=' + $diagProducts.count + ' tradewares=' + $diagTradewares.count + ' resources=' + $diagResources.count

'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': STATION dst ' + $diagStation.idcode + ' ware=' + $diagWare + ' cargo=' + $cargoCount + '/' + $cargoTarget + ' (' + $cargoRatio + '%)' + ' buy(partner:a=' + $buyPartnerAvail + ',m=' + $buyPartnerAmount + '; ignore:a=' + $buyIgnoreAvail + ',m=' + $buyIgnoreAmount + ')' + ' sell(partner:a=' + $sellPartnerAvail + ',m=' + $sellPartnerAmount + '; ignore:a=' + $sellIgnoreAvail + ',m=' + $sellIgnoreAmount + ')'

'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': no active destinations (destList=' + this.$destList.count + ', sourceCursor=' + this.$sourceStation.knownname + ' [' + this.$sourceStation.idcode + '], srcList=' + this.$activeSources.count + ' [' + $sourceNames + '], invalid=' + $destInvalidCount + ')'

wait.comment: Desync cargo-clear trade creation across ships

do_if.value: not this.$autowares and this.$warebasket? and this.$warebasket.count gt 0
this.$autowares and $resolvedWaresDisplay != $currentWaresDisplay and this.ship.defaultorder? and this.ship.defaultorder.id == 'GalaxyTraderMK2'

debug_text.text: '[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': resolved wares (' + (if this.$autowares then 'auto' else 'manual') + ') count=' + $resolvedWaresCount + ' [' + $resolvedWaresDisplay + ']'

do_if.value: this.ship.pilot? and global.$GT_Pilots? and global.$GT_Pilots.{this.ship.pilot}? and global.$GT_Pilots.{this.ship.pilot}.$Level?
not this.$stickySource? or not this.$stickySource.exists or not this.$stickyDestination? or not this.$stickyDestination.exists

wait.comment: Yield after source offer diagnostics probe
Yield after source offer diagnostics formatting

do_if.value: ($sourceOfferAmount == null or $sourceOfferAmount le 0) and this.$ignoretraderules and $source.isplayerowned

wait.comment: Yield after source offer diagnostics probe
Yield after source offer diagnostics formatting
Yield after destination offer diagnostics probe
Yield after destination offer diagnostics formatting

do_if.value: ($destOfferAmount == null or $destOfferAmount le 0) and this.$ignoretraderules and $dest.isplayerowned

wait.comment: Yield after destination offer diagnostics probe
Yield after destination offer diagnostics formatting

set_value.name: $noNeedDetails
set_value.exact: $noNeedDetails + $source.idcode + '->' + $dest.idcode + ':' + $ware + ' src=' + $sourceRatio + '% dst=' + $destRatio + '% bucket=' + $needBucket + ' thresholds(min=' + this.$minStorage + ',max=' + this.$maxStorage + ')'

do_if.value: this.$sourceStation? and this.$sourceStation.exists and this.$lastTradeDestination? and this.$lastTradeDestination.exists

this.$stickyCyclesLeft gt 0 and this.$stickySource? and this.$stickyDestination? and this.$stickyWare? and this.$stickySource == $source and this.$stickyDestination == $dest and this.$stickyWare == $ware

debug_text.text: '[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': no trade selected. src=' + this.$activeSources.count + ', dst=' + this.$activeDestinations.count + ', eval=' + $evalPairs + ', skips: illegal/cargo=' + $skipIllegalOrNoCargo + ', noSrcOffer=' + $skipNoSourceOffer + ', srcNoTarget=' + $skipSourceNoTarget + ', srcBelowStatic=' + $skipSourceBelowStatic + ', self=' + $skipSelfTarget + ', distance=' + $skipDistance + ', noDstOffer=' + $skipNoDestOffer + ', noNeed=' + $skipNoNeed + ', minTrade=' + $skipMinTrade + ', reserved=' + $skipReserved
'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': noSrcOffer details: ' + $noSourceOfferDetails
'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': noDstOffer details: ' + $noDestOfferDetails
'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': srcBelowStatic details: ' + $sourceBelowStaticDetails
'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': noNeed details: ' + $noNeedDetails
'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': trade denied by threat intelligence for destination sector ' + $bestTrade.$Destination.sector.knownname

'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': selected trade ' + $bestTrade.$Ware + ' from ' + $bestTrade.$Source.knownname + ' to ' + $bestTrade.$Destination.knownname + ' amount=' + $bestTrade.$Amount + ' score=' + $bestScore + ' incomingReserved=' + (if $bestTrade.$IncomingReservedAmount? then $bestTrade.$IncomingReservedAmount else 0) + ' effectiveNeed=' + $bestDestOfferAmount + ' internal=' + $tradeOrderInternal + ' ignoreRules=' + this.$ignoretraderules

do_if.value: ($destOfferStillAmount == null or $destOfferStillAmount le 0) and this.$ignoretraderules and $bestDestOffer? and $bestDestOffer.owner? and $bestDestOffer.owner.isplayerowned
$bestSourceOffer == null or not $bestSourceOffer.available or $sourceOfferStillAmount le 0 or $bestDestOffer == null or not $bestDestOffer.available or $destOfferStillAmount le 0

debug_text.text: '[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': selected trade invalid before queueing (source/dest changed) srcAvail=' + (if $bestSourceOffer? then $bestSourceOffer.available else false) + ' srcAmt=' + $sourceOfferStillAmount + ' dstAvail=' + (if $bestDestOffer? then $bestDestOffer.available else false) + ' dstAmt=' + $destOfferStillAmount + ' -- retrying'

wait.comment: Desync MK2 buy leg creation across ships

debug_text.text: '[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': selected trade collapsed during pre-queue clamp (buy=' + $buyAmount + ', sell=' + $sellAmount + ') -- retrying'

set_value.name: this.$sourceUsage.{$bestTrade.$Source}
set_value.exact: if this.$sourceUsage? and this.$sourceUsage.{$bestTrade.$Source}? then this.$sourceUsage.{$bestTrade.$Source} + 1 else 1

set_value.name: this.$destUsage.{$bestTrade.$Destination}
set_value.exact: if this.$destUsage? and this.$destUsage.{$bestTrade.$Destination}? then this.$destUsage.{$bestTrade.$Destination} + 1 else 1

do_if.value: this.$stickyCyclesLeft gt 0 and this.$stickySource? and this.$stickyDestination? and this.$stickyWare? and this.$stickySource == $bestTrade.$Source and this.$stickyDestination == $bestTrade.$Destination and this.$stickyWare == $bestTrade.$Ware

debug_text.text: '[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': routeProfile lvl=' + $pilotLevelProfile + ' alpha=' + $routeAlpha + ' beta=' + $routeBeta + ' lane=' + $routeLaneBonus + ' stickyTTL=' + this.$stickyCyclesLeft + ' lowFloor=' + $lowVolumeFloorEffPercent + '%'

do_if.value: ($returnSellAmount == null or $returnSellAmount le 0) and this.$ignoretraderules and $bestTrade.$Destination.isplayerowned
($returnBuyAmount == null or $returnBuyAmount le 0) and this.$ignoretraderules and $bestTrade.$Source.isplayerowned
$returnSell != null and $returnSell.available and $returnSellAmount gt 0 and $returnBuy != null and $returnBuy.available and $returnBuyAmount gt 0

wait.comment: Desync MK2 return sell leg creation across ships

do_if.value: not $denyTrade and $bestTrade? and $bestTrade.$UsedLowVolume? and $bestTrade.$UsedLowVolume and $bestTrade.$NormalMinimumTrade? and $bestTrade.$Amount lt $bestTrade.$NormalMinimumTrade

debug_text.text: '[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': retry backoff (count=' + this.$noTradeRetryCount + ', wait=' + ($retryMin / 1s)i + '-' + ($retryMax / 1s)i + 's)'

do_if.value: this.ship.commander? and this.ship.commander.exists and this.ship.commander != this.ship

debug_text.text: '[GT-CleanupTrace] trace=' + $abortTraceId + ' source=MK2_ON_ABORT cue=order.trade.galaxytraderMK2 ship=' + this.ship.idcode + ' inRegistry=' + $abortInRegistry + ' default=' + $abortDefaultOrder + ' commander=' + $abortCommanderId + ' action=ON_ABORT_ENTRY'

do_if.value: this.ship.commander? and this.ship.commander.exists and this.ship.commander != this.ship

debug_text.text: '[GT-CleanupTrace] trace=' + $cleanupTraceId + ' source=MK2_ON_ABORT ship=' + this.ship.idcode + ' default=' + (if $cleanupDefaultOrder then $cleanupDefaultOrder else 'NONE') + ' commander=' + $cleanupCommanderId + ' commanderOrder=' + $cleanupCommanderOrder + ' action=SIGNAL_GT_ORDER_CANCELLED+ORPHAN_CHECK'
'[GT-MK2] ' + this.ship.idcode + ': on_abort -> triggered orphan cleanup check'
'[GT-CleanupTrace] trace=' + $abortTraceId + ' source=MK2_ON_ABORT cue=order.trade.galaxytraderMK2 ship=' + this.ship.idcode + ' action=FILTERED_NOT_IN_REGISTRY'
